Class EuclideanDistanceFunction<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>

java.lang.Object

      de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.AbstractMeasurementFunction<O,D>

              de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.EuclideanDistanceFunction<V>
Type Parameters:
V - the type of FeatureVector to compute the distances in between
All Implemented Interfaces:
DistanceFunction<V,DoubleDistance>, MeasurementFunction<V,DoubleDistance>, SpatialDistanceFunction<V,DoubleDistance>, Parameterizable
public class EuclideanDistanceFunction<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
extends AbstractDistanceFunction<V,DoubleDistance>
implements SpatialDistanceFunction<V,DoubleDistance>, Parameterizable

Provides the Euclidean distance for FeatureVectors.

Author:
Arthur Zimek
